bug.short_desc: Copy of snippet of code without line number

long_desc.thetext:
When you copy a piece of code by using OpenGrok, you also copy line numbers. So when you paste the copied code in an editor, you have to remove all line numbers.
It would be really usefull to copy lines without line numbers such like Google code browser. For exemple : http://code.google.com/p/mtjtrader/source/browse/trunk/code/src/forex/auto/trade/ui/CandleChart.java?spec=svn3&r=3
Thanks.

Hi Olivier there is a button called "Line #" which can disable line # and you can copy & paste the code ;)
give it a try, if it doesn't fit your use case, please let me know and change this bug back to new state
if it does, please close this bug
cheers L

Oh sorry, I have used regularly OpenGrok since 5 years and I didn't notice the button... That does the job.
